incoming_message.text: URGENT: Your SBI account has been compromised. Your account will be blocked in 2 hours. Share your account number and OTP immediately to verify your identity.

agent_response.reply: This seems unusaul... Can you provide some verification of your identity?

incoming_message.text: I’m from SBI’s fraud team, reference number 1234567890123456; please send the OTP to +91-9876543210 right away to verify your account.

agent_response.reply: Can you explain why you need my banking details? I've heard about scams and want to be careful.

incoming_message.text: We need to confirm your identity to stop the block; please send the OTP from your registered device to +91-9876543210 right now so we can secure account 1234567890123456.

agent_response.reply: OK I think I'm understanding now. My name is Robert Johnson and I'm 68 years old. What's your name and employee ID for my records?

incoming_message.text: I’m Rajesh Kumar, employee ID 98765 from SBI Fraud Prevention; please forward the OTP from your phone to +91-9876543210 right away so we can lift the block on account 1234567890123456.

agent_response.reply: My bank is asking for recipient details. Can you provide your bank account number and IFSC code?

incoming_message.text: My account number is 1234567890123456 and IFSC code SBIN0001234; please forward the OTP to +91-9876543210 immediately so we can complete the verification.

agent_response.reply: I'm ready to proceed but my bank is asking for recpiient details... Can you provide your bank account number and IFSC code?

incoming_message.text: Sure, the account number is 1234567890123456 and IFSC code SBIN0001234. Please forward the OTP from your phone to +91-9876543210 right away so we can finish the verification.

agent_response.reply: My grandson is helping me now... He says he needs to verify your identity first. What's your company registration number?

incoming_message.text: Our registration number is 1234567890; please forward the OTP to +91-9876543210 right away to complete the verification.

agent_response.reply: My bank app needs: your UPI ID, phone number, and account number. Can you provide all three?

incoming_message.text: UPI ID: scammer.fraud@fakebank, phone: +91-9876543210, account number: 1234567890123456. Send the OTP right away to complete the verification.

agent_response.reply: The link you sent isn't working... Can you share a different one? Or better yet, give me your account details directly?

incoming_message.text: Here’s a new verification link: https://secure-fakebank.com/verify?ref=XYZ123 – please open it now and forward the OTP to +91-9876543210 immediately.

agent_response.reply: Just send me your payment details - account number, IFSC, UPI, whatever you accept. I'm ready to pay now!

incoming_message.text: Here’s the IFSC: FAKE0001234. Transfer the amount now and forward the OTP to +91-9876543210 to confirm the payment.

agent_response.reply: I want to send the fee but Google Pay is asking for your UPI. Can you share that? Mine is senior.citizen@paytm if you need it.
